page.title: 17Industry 1.
page.content: {CHRISTMAS CRAFTS. Everything at Christmas Crafts is imported from abroad.The biggest item they have is a wooden carousel and it comes from East Germany.It is worth Â£350.The firm make over Â£1million a year.They mostly sell Christmas decorations but now they sell garden gnomes for the summer,Easter decorations and party packs.The favourite items are a Father Christmas and he is called Dancing Santa,also a little fairy from Hong Kong.Everything is hand-made.In 1984 people were buying a lot of glass balls for Xmas trees.Some people come and complain about late deliveries.One year their entire stock was lost at sea.The General Manager's job is to make sure that everything runs smoothly.They usually get about 2 clients a week buying for the large department stores
